parameters: Processing at the Start of Battle
Executes only once when SRPG_Battle Start is performed.
If there are multiple pages, the 1st page will be executed.
SRPG_Battle Startが行われた時、一度だけ実行されます。
複数ページある場合、一番上のページが実行されます。
In addition to the initialization process on the plugin side,
you can enter the event you want to execute.
- Performance at the start of battle
- Conversation event at the start of battle, etc.
プラグイン側の初期化処理に加えて、
実行したいイベントを入力してください。
戦闘開始時の会話イベント　など
To manage flags on the map,
This demo uses the self switch 'D' to create an event
that runs only once during battle.
Self switch 'D' initializes at the start of battle.
// turn off the self switch D for all events on the demo map
They took advantage of the royal treasure that
It's like they're trying to resurrect an Evil
God that was sealed away a long time ago!
Stop the resurrection of the Evil God!
Victory Condition: Rescue the princess, stop the resurrection
Defeat Condition: Sidney loses the battle, 30 turns elapse
Text of win/loss conditions = - Rescue the Princess

parameters.text: - Stop the resurrection of the evil gods

parameters: Text of win/loss conditions = - Stop the resurrection of th…
Text of win/loss conditions = - Sydney is incapacitated
Text of win/loss conditions = - 30 turns passed
Processing at the beginning of an actor's turn
Executed at the start of an actor's turn.
If there are multiple pages, the 1st page will be executed.
It is used for production and events
at the start of the actor turn.
Example: - Displaying messages and changing BGM
- Conversation event at the start of the turn, etc.
Processing at the start of enemy turn
Executed at the start of the enemy's turn.
If there are multiple pages, the 1st page will be executed.
Used for effects and events at the start of
- Conversation event at the start of the turn, etc.
Executed after all actions of actors and enemies.
If there are multiple pages, the 1st page will be executed.
Because it is executed after adding the number of turns,
The number of elapsed turns is shifted by 1.
Example: If you want to execute an event after 5 turns have passed
Enter the event you want to execute at the end of your turn.
Example: Production and conversation event at the end of the turn
Battle victory/defeat after a certain number of turns have passed
The number of turns is stored in a variable (default ID 3).
Defeat condition: 30 turns have passed (before the final boss)
Time is over. We lost the battle......
Ah, it's too dangerous if we keep going.
I'll transfer you to the guild - teleport!
Executed before a unit moves and begins combat.
If there are multiple pages, the 1st page will be executed.
ユニットが移動し、戦闘を開始する前に実行されます。
複数ページある場合、一番上のページが実行されます。
Conversation events between actors and enemies
アクター・エネミーの会話イベントなどを
想定したタイミングのイベントです。
Determine if the event is in action/target
Executed when the unit has finished its action.
If there are multiple pages, the 1st page will be executed.
After each unit action of the actor/enemy
You can enter an event to be executed.
it is used to perform [determining victory / defeat].
If the conditions are met, such as a specific unit being
unable to fight or the number of remaining actors and enemies
being 0, the battle can be ended by executing
If two two bosses are defeated,
the wall of flame becomes page 2 with no image set
When an actor unit arrives at region ID 1,
it will trigger an event to spawn a boss.
Determines if there is an actor in a given region
Where are the guys who kidnapped
I think they got scared of us
From the way the princess was behaving,
They're the people I paid for.
you were the mastermind since the beginning?
Those guys did a good job.
I was able to outsmart the King and obtained this.
All of this... for the sake of resurrection of the "Evil God"...
The treasure of the royal family...
With the power of the 'Evil God',
we can reform the system of this country.
I will be the queen of my new country!
The power of "Evil God" is beyond human control...
That's why it has been sealed away.
I will obtain the power of the "Evil God"...
I won't let anyone stand in my way!
What the hell is going to happen?
This is the power of the "Evil God"...!
Hi hi hi...... ha ha ha ha ha ha!
With this power, I can rule this country!"
Nope... I don't need a country anymore.
It's enough just by me alone.
The true goddess who guides the mortals!
The name of the "Evil God" is... if I remember...
the sapling of the goddess swallowed by destruction...
...... if you can still call her a princess.
have become the substitute for the "Evil God"...
What in the world can we do ......
You are truly a brave gentleman.
Challenge the "evil god"... It's not bad.
I must stop your mistake now!
burned everything down with his light...
are you trying to challenge a God!
With your blood, you will be the sacrifice

Well, let's go back to the guild......

Oh no... Anything beyond this is dangerous.
I'll transfer you to the guild—teleport!

finishes acting on this event during SRPG Battle.
